tools/fcswapAssoc.c

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /**
00002  * \file fcswapAssoc.c
00003  * \brief Given a dataset, convert element data to vertex data, or vice versa. 
00004  * 
00005  * $Source: /usr/local/Repositories/fcdmf/fclib/tools/fcswapAssoc.c,v $
00006  * $Revision: 1.1 $
00007  * $Date: 2007/03/07 21:31:39 $
00008  *
00009  * \description
00010  * Usage: fcswapAssociation [options] input_file
00011  *   options:
00012  *    -o output_file_name
00013  *    -d [e2v|v2e]             -- direction: element-to-vertex or vertex-to-element
00014  *    -m mesh_name             -- specific mesh to work on
00015  *    -n variable_name         -- specific variable to work on
00016  *    -r new_label_extension   -- string appended to new variables
00017  *    -R                       -- remove original variable from output
00018  *    -v                       -- print warning messages
00019  *    -V                       -- print log messages
00020  *    -h                       -- print this help message
00021  *
00022  *        Given a dataset, create a new dataset whose variables have
00023  *        all been converted from element to vertex associations or
00024  *        vice versa. Through command line switches, the user can
00025  *        specify a specific variable/mesh to work on, an extension to
00026  *        append on to the new variable's name, and whether the original
00027  *        variable should be deleted. New variables are always type
00028  *        FC_DT_DOUBLE.
00029  *
00030  *        Note: Issues with the ExodusII file format limit just how
00031  *        selective the user can be with the -m -n options. If a variable
00032  *        is converted in one mesh, it is converted in all meshes.
00033  *
00034  *
00035  * \modifications
00036  *   - 03/06/2007 CDU created
00037  */
00038 #include <stdio.h>
00039 #include <unistd.h>
00040 #include <string.h>
00041 #include <fc.h>
00042 
00043 
00044 //=============================================================================
00045 static int checkVarAndCreateName(FC_Variable v_in, 
00046                      FC_AssociationType search_assocType,
00047                      char  *target_var_name,
00048                      int    replace_var,
00049                      char  *mod_extension,
00050                      char **ret_new_name){
00051   
00052   char *temp_name, *new_name;
00053   FC_AssociationType v_atype;
00054   FC_DataType        v_dtype;
00055   FC_ReturnCode rc;
00056 
00057   *ret_new_name = NULL;
00058 
00059   //Get the variable's name to see if it matches
00060   rc = fc_getVariableName( v_in, &temp_name);
00061   fc_exitIfError(rc);
00062   rc = fc_getVariableInfo( v_in, NULL,NULL, &v_atype, NULL, &v_dtype);
00063   fc_exitIfError(rc);
00064 
00065   if( (v_atype != search_assocType)           ||     //Only elements
00066       !((v_dtype == FC_DT_DOUBLE) ||              //Only doubles, floats, ints
00067      (v_dtype == FC_DT_FLOAT)  ||
00068      (v_dtype == FC_DT_INT)      )      ||
00069       ((strlen(target_var_name)!=0) &&       //user specified a name and
00070        (strcmp(target_var_name,temp_name)))){ // name different than this
00071     *ret_new_name = NULL;
00072     free(temp_name);
00073     return 0;
00074   }
00075 
00076   //If replacing, then use name we were given
00077   if(replace_var){
00078     *ret_new_name = temp_name;
00079     return 1;
00080   }
00081 
00082   //Let someone else rename if we weren't given a modifier
00083   if(!strlen(mod_extension)){
00084     *ret_new_name = NULL;
00085     free(temp_name);
00086     return 1;
00087   }
00088   //Create a name for the new guy
00089   new_name = (char *)malloc(strlen(temp_name)+strlen(mod_extension)+1);
00090   if(!new_name)
00091     fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(FC_MEMORY_ERROR,"Memory Error");
00092   sprintf(new_name, "%s%s",temp_name, mod_extension);
00093   //fc_printfLogMessage("New name will be '%s'\n",new_name);
00094   //printf("New name will be '%s'\n",new_name);
00095   free(temp_name);
00096   *ret_new_name = new_name;
00097   return 1;
00098 }
00099 
00100 //=============================================================================
00101 static void dumpHelp(void){
00102   printf("Usage: fcswapAssociation [options] input_file\n");
00103   printf("  options:\n");
00104   printf("     -o output_file_name\n");
00105   printf("     -d [e2v|v2e]             -- direction: element-to-vertex or vertex-to-element\n");
00106   printf("     -m mesh_name             -- specific mesh to work on\n");
00107   printf("     -n variable_name         -- specific variable to work on\n");
00108   printf("     -r new_label_extension   -- string appended to new variables\n");
00109   printf("     -R                       -- remove original variable from output\n");
00110   printf("     -v                       -- print warning messages\n");
00111   printf("     -V                       -- print log messages\n");
00112   printf("     -h                       -- print this help message\n");
00113 
00114   exit(0);
00115 }

00118 //=============================================================================
00119 static void checkArgs(int argc,            char **argv,
00120                 FC_VerbosityLevel   *verbose_level,
00121                 FC_FileIOType       *new_fileType,
00122                 char                **file_in_name,
00123                 char                **file_out_name,
00124                 char                **mesh_name,
00125                 char                **var_name,
00126                 FC_AssociationType   *search_assocType,
00127                 FC_AssociationType   *target_assocType,
00128                 int                  *replace_var,
00129                 char                **mod_name){
00130 
00131 
00132   FC_FileIOType     ft[] = { FC_FT_EXODUS, FC_FT_EXODUS };
00133   char         *ft_ext[] = { ".exo",       ".ex2" };
00134   int           ft_num   = 2;
00135   char *infile_base;
00136   char *infile_ext;
00137   char *outfile_ext;
00138   int   type_set=0;
00139   int i,ich;
00140 
00141   if(argc<2) dumpHelp();
00142 
00143 
00144   //Parse input parameters
00145   while( (ich = getopt(argc, argv, "hvVm:n:o:t:d:r:R")) != EOF){
00146     switch(ich){
00147 
00148     case 'r': *mod_name      = optarg;              break;
00149     case 'R': *replace_var   = 1;                   break;
00150     case 'm': *mesh_name     = optarg;              break;
00151     case 'n': *var_name      = optarg;              break;
00152     case 'v': *verbose_level = FC_WARNING_MESSAGES; break;
00153     case 'V': *verbose_level = FC_LOG_MESSAGES;     break;
00154 
00155     case 'o': //Output file name
00156       *file_out_name = optarg;
00157       break;
00158 
00159     case 'd': //Direction
00160       if(!strcasecmp(optarg,"e2v"))      *search_assocType = FC_AT_ELEMENT;
00161       else if(!strcasecmp(optarg,"v2e")) *search_assocType = FC_AT_VERTEX;
00162       else dumpHelp();
00163       break;
00164      
00165     case 'h': 
00166     default: 
00167       dumpHelp(); break;
00168     }
00169   }
00170   if(optind < argc){
00171     *file_in_name = argv[optind];
00172   }
00173 
00174   //We at least need an input file name
00175   if(!strlen(*file_in_name)) dumpHelp();
00176 
00177 
00178   
00179 
00180   //Check the output file name
00181   if(strlen(*file_out_name)){
00182     //User gave us something. Make sure it's right type
00183     outfile_ext = fc_getExtension(*file_out_name,1);
00184     i=0;
00185     while((i<ft_num) && (strcasecmp(outfile_ext, &(ft_ext[i][1]))))
00186       i++;
00187     if( (i==ft_num) ||                                   //Unknown extension? 
00188         ((type_set) && (*new_fileType != ft[i])) ){ //Different extension than filename
00189       //The file name doesn't reflect the data. We need to append with
00190       //the proper extension
00191       i=0;
00192       while((i<ft_num) && (ft[i]!= *new_fileType))
00193      i++;
00194      
00195       *file_out_name = (char *)realloc(*file_out_name, 
00196                            strlen(*file_out_name)+strlen(ft_ext[i])+1);
00197       strcat(*file_out_name, ft_ext[i]);
00198 
00199     } else if(!type_set){
00200       //The user is setting the output type via file name
00201       *new_fileType = ft[i];
00202     }
00203     free(outfile_ext);
00204 
00205   } else {
00206     //User didn't give us a name. Create a simple one in local directory
00207     infile_base = fc_getBasenameWOExtension(*file_in_name, 1);
00208 
00209     //Figure out extension.. is there a call for this?
00210     i=0;
00211     while((i<ft_num) && (ft[i]!=*new_fileType))
00212       i++;
00213     //Note: Error check is handled when in arg case above
00214 
00215     infile_ext  = ft_ext[i];
00216     *file_out_name = (char *)malloc(strlen(infile_base) +
00217                         strlen("_mod")      +
00218                         strlen(infile_ext)  + 1);
00219     strcpy(*file_out_name, infile_base);
00220     strcat(*file_out_name, "_mod");
00221     strcat(*file_out_name, infile_ext);
00222 
00223     free(infile_base);
00224   }
00225 
00226   //Come up with the direction
00227   if      (*search_assocType == FC_AT_ELEMENT) *target_assocType = FC_AT_VERTEX;
00228   else if (*search_assocType == FC_AT_VERTEX)  *target_assocType = FC_AT_ELEMENT;
00229   else {
00230     printf("Unknown search association type?\n");
00231     dumpHelp();
00232   }
00233      
00234 }
00235

00237 //=============================================================================
00238 int main(int argc, char **argv){
00239 
00240   char *file_in_name = "";///datasets/can_crush.ex2";
00241   char *file_out_name = "";
00242   char *search_mesh_name     = "";
00243   char *search_variable_name = "";
00244   char *mod_extension = "";     //What we append to vars we find
00245   int   replace_var = 0;        //Replace the variable instead of duplicating it
00246   FC_ReturnCode rc;
00247   FC_VerbosityLevel verbose_level = FC_QUIET;
00248   FC_FileIOType new_fileType = FC_FT_EXODUS;
00249   FC_Dataset dataset;
00250   FC_Mesh *meshes;
00251   FC_Variable *vars, **seqVars;
00252   FC_AssociationType search_assocType = FC_AT_ELEMENT;
00253   FC_AssociationType target_assocType = FC_AT_VERTEX;
00254   int numMesh,numSeqVar, *numStepPerSeqVar;
00255   int numVar;
00256   char *temp_name, *new_name;
00257   int i,j;
00258 
00259 
00260   //Parse the args to figure out what we're supposed to do
00261   checkArgs(argc, argv, &verbose_level, &new_fileType, 
00262          &file_in_name, &file_out_name,
00263          &search_mesh_name, 
00264          &search_variable_name,
00265          &search_assocType,
00266          &target_assocType,
00267          &replace_var,
00268          &mod_extension);
00269 
00270 
00271   //Setup the library and load in the dataset
00272   rc = fc_setLibraryVerbosity(verbose_level);        fc_exitIfError(rc);
00273   rc = fc_initLibrary();                             fc_exitIfError(rc);
00274   rc = fc_loadDataset(file_in_name, &dataset);       fc_exitIfError(rc);
00275 
00276 
00277   //Get the meshes that match a name, or all meshes
00278   if(!strcmp(search_mesh_name, "")){
00279     rc = fc_getMeshes(dataset, &numMesh, &meshes);
00280   } else {
00281     rc = fc_getMeshByName(dataset, search_mesh_name, &numMesh, &meshes); 
00282   }
00283   fc_exitIfError(rc);
00284 
00285   //Go through all the meshes, looking for var's with FC_DT_ELEMENT
00286   for(i=0; i< numMesh; i++){
00287 
00288     fc_getMeshName(meshes[i], &temp_name);
00289     //printf("Working on Mesh '%s'\n", temp_name);
00290     free(temp_name);
00291 
00292     //-- Check All variables --------------------------------------------------
00293     rc = fc_getVariables(meshes[i], &numVar, &vars); 
00294     fc_exitIfError(rc);
00295     
00296     for(j=0;j<numVar;j++){
00297       if(checkVarAndCreateName(vars[j], 
00298                       search_assocType, search_variable_name, 
00299                       replace_var, mod_extension, 
00300                       &new_name)){
00301      FC_Variable new_var;
00302      char *old_name;
00303 
00304      rc = fc_getVariableName(vars[j], &old_name);
00305      fc_exitIfError(rc);
00306        
00307      //printf("  converting var %s to %s\n",old_name, (new_name)?new_name : "(library's choice)");
00308 
00309      rc = fc_copyVariableWithNewAssociation( vars[j],  
00310                               target_assocType, new_name, 
00311                               &new_var);
00312      fc_exitIfError(rc);
00313 
00314      if(replace_var) 
00315        fc_deleteVariable(vars[j]);
00316 
00317      //Cleanup
00318      free(old_name);
00319      free(new_name);
00320       }
00321     }
00322     free(vars);
00323 
00324 
00325     //-- Check All SeqVariables -----------------------------------------------
00326     rc = fc_getSeqVariables(meshes[i], 
00327                    &numSeqVar, &numStepPerSeqVar,
00328                    &seqVars);
00329     fc_exitIfError(rc);
00330 
00331     for(j=0; j<numSeqVar; j++){
00332 
00333       if(checkVarAndCreateName(seqVars[j][0],
00334                       search_assocType, search_variable_name, 
00335                       replace_var, mod_extension, 
00336                       &new_name)){
00337      FC_Variable* new_seqVar;
00338      char *old_name;
00339 
00340      rc = fc_getVariableName(seqVars[j][0], &old_name);
00341      fc_exitIfError(rc)
00342      
00343        //printf("  converting seqVar %s to %s\n",old_name, (new_name)?new_name : "(library's choice)");
00344 
00345 
00346      rc = fc_copySeqVariableWithNewAssociation(numStepPerSeqVar[j], seqVars[j],
00347                                 target_assocType,
00348                                 new_name, //or null
00349                                 &new_seqVar);
00350 
00351      fc_exitIfError(rc);
00352 
00353      if(replace_var) 
00354        fc_deleteSeqVariable(numStepPerSeqVar[j], seqVars[j]);
00355 
00356      //Cleanup
00357      free(old_name);
00358      free(new_name);
00359      free(new_seqVar);
00360       } 
00361       free(seqVars[j]);
00362     }
00363     free(numStepPerSeqVar);
00364     free(seqVars);
00365 
00366   }
00367   free(meshes);
00368  
00369   //Write out the results
00370   rc = fc_rewriteDataset(dataset, file_out_name, new_fileType);
00371  
00372 
00373   //Clean out everything
00374   fc_finalLibrary();
00375   exit(0);
00376 
00377 }
